name: The X Cedars-Sinai Parkinson's Disease and Movement Disorders Annual Symposium
content: The X Cedars-Sinai Parkinson's Disease and Movement Disorders Annual Symposium expert faculty will dive deep into the challenges and opportunities for clinicians and healthcare professionals managing patients with PD. Join us as we explore current and emerging medical and surgical advances that can be implemented to slow disease progression and enhance patients' quality of life. We will also focus on the complexities of these disorders, including motor and non-motor symptoms, as well as the importance of nutritional and lifestyle changes. URLs: Twitter: https://go.evvnt.com/2523030-2?pid=4868 LinkedIn: https://go.evvnt.com/2523030-3?pid=4868 Time: 7:15 AM - 3:45 PM Venue details: The Shay - Destination by Hyatt, 8801 Washington Boulevard, Culver City, California, 90232, United States Prices: Physicians: USD 225.00, Non-physicians: USD 160.00, Residents/Fellows: USD 0.00, Cedars-Sinai Nurses, Therapists and CRCs: USD 0.00 Speakers: Michele Tagliati, MD, Echo Tan, MD
